english.segment1: I believe I could see my life clearer. Walking in Amsterdam. There's an ocean between. Who I am and who I was. Walking in Amsterdam
english.segment2: Now I run. Every one of my days has become. A pursuit of what I once had. Can I get it back. Can I get it back
english.segment3: Can I get back to the time. When every step had purpose. I was so clearly defined. Someday I'll resurface. Walking in Amsterdam.
